title: CERC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Chief Posts
description: The Central Electricity Regulatory Commission (CERC) has declared the official notification for 2025 to fill the vacancies forÂ Chief Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified for the Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the CERC Recruitment 2025 . Interested candidates can apply before the last date of application. If you are looking for more...
